title: NASCAR And Mayweather Vs. Pacquiao: The Week In Sports
teaser: The fight of the millennium is on! Floyd Mayweather Jr. and Manny Pacquiao will meet later this spring. And it's NASCAR opening day. NPR's Scott Simon talks to Tom Goldman about the latest in sports.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
